PresentValueOfFutureMinimumLeasePayments.label: Present Value of Future Minimum Lease Payments, Sale Leaseback Transactions
PresentValueOfFutureMinimumLeasePayments.description: Present value of minimum lease payments for sale-leaseback transactions accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

ProceedsFromBankDebt.label: Proceeds from Bank Debt
ProceedsFromBankDebt.description: The cash inflow from bank borrowing during the year.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDeb.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from other long-term debt.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Restricted Cash, Financing Activities
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRestrictedCashFi.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from cash and cash items that are not available for withdrawal or usage.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Machinery and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash inflow from sale of machinery and equipment.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherNet.description: Amount after depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RelatedPartyCosts.label: Related Party Costs
RelatedPartyCosts.description: Direct costs arising from transactions with related parties who are not affiliates or joint Ventures. These costs are categorized as cost of goods sold.

RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.label: Related Party Transaction, Due from (to) Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionDueFromToRelatedP.description: Receivables to be collected from (obligations owed to) related parties, net as of the balance sheet date where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfBankDebt.label: Repayments of Bank Debt
RepaymentsOfBankDebt.description: The cash outflow to settle a bank borrowing during the year.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.label: Research and Development Expense
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.label: Sales and Excise Tax Payable, Current
SalesAndExciseTaxPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred through that date and payable for statutory sales and use taxes, including value added tax. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SalesRevenueServicesNet.label: Sales Revenue, Services, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueServicesNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from services rendered in the normal course of business, after deducting allowances and discounts.

SecuredDebt.label: Secured Debt
SecuredDebt.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date, including the current and noncurrent portions, of collateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer). Such obligations include mortgage loans, chattel loans, and any other borrowings secured by assets of the borrower.

SellingExpense.label: Selling Expense
SellingExpense.description: Expenses recognized in the period that are directly related to the selling and distribution of products or services.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermInvestments.label: Short-term Investments
ShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossF.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossF.description: Accumulated adjustment, net of tax, that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency from the functional currency of the reporting entity, net of reclassification of realized foreign currency translation gains or losses.

AdditionalPaidInCapital.label: Additional Paid in Capital
AdditionalPaidInCapital.description: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders. Includes adjustments to additional paid in capital. Some examples of such adjustments include recording the issuance of debt with a beneficial conversion feature and certain tax consequences of equity instruments awarded to employees. Use this element for the aggregate amount of additional paid-in capital associated with common and preferred stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only common stock, use the element additional paid in capital, common stock. For additional paid-in capital associated with only preferred stock, use the element additional paid in capital, preferred stock.

CompensationExpenseExcludingCostOfGoodAn.label: Compensation Expense, Excluding Cost of Good and Service Sold
CompensationExpenseExcludingCostOfGoodAn.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit. Other employee benefit expense includes, but is not limited to, service component of net periodic benefit cost for defined benefit plan. Excludes compensation cost in cost of good and service sold.

CostOfRevenue.label: Cost of Revenue
CostOfRevenue.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPr.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Change in Present Value, Interest Income
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleChangeInPr.description: Amount of interest income on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), from change in present value of expected cash flows, attributable to passage of time.

DerivativeAverageFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Average Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeAverageFixedInterestRate.description: Average fixed interest rate related to the group of interest rate derivatives.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerCashDist.description: Amount of cash distribution paid to unit-holder of limited partnership (LP).

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
IncreaseDecreaseInPayablesToBrokerDealer.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations incurred arising from transactions with broker-dealers, such as amounts due on margin and unsettled cash transactions; includes payables to brokers, dealers and clearing organizations.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

InventoryGross.label: Inventory, Gross
InventoryGross.description: Gross amount, as of the balance sheet date, of merchandise, goods, commodities, or supplies held for future sale or to be used in manufacturing, servicing or production process.

IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.label: Issuance of Stock and Warrants for Services or Claims
IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.description: Fair value of share-based compensation granted to nonemployees as payment for services rendered or acknowledged claims.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

NetInvestmentIncome.label: Net Investment Income
NetInvestmentIncome.description: Amount, after investment expense, of income earned from investments in securities and real estate. Includes, but is not limited to, real estate investment, policy loans, dividends, and interest. Excludes realized gain (loss) on investments.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.label: Payments for Repurchase of Initial Public Offering
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfInitialPublicOffe.description: The cash outflow associated with the repurchase of amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.label: Premium Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
PremiumsReceivableAllowanceForDoubtfulAc.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the estimated valuation allowance to reduce gross premiums receivable to net realizable value.

ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Short-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfShortTermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, within the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the short-term.

Supplies.label: Prepaid Supplies
Supplies.description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.label: Accrued Liabilities and Other Liabilities
AccruedLiabilitiesAndOtherLiabilities.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid nor invoiced, and liabilities classified as other.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

OtherLongTermInvestments.label: Other Long-term Investments
OtherLongTermInvestments.description: Amount of long-term investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Long-term Investments
PaymentsToAcquireLongtermInvestments.description: The cash outflow for securities or other assets acquired, which qualify for treatment as an investing activity and are to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle. Includes cash flows from securities classified as trading securities that were acquired for reasons other than sale in the long-term.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivable. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Accounts and Other Receivables, Net, Current
AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.label: Allowance for Doubtful Accounts, Premiums and Other Receivables
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Accounts Payable
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of liabilities incurred for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business and related party payables, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Inventory
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of inventory recognized as of the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Less Noncontrolling Interest
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed, less the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpense.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpense.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowances, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences from reserves and accruals, compensation and benefit costs, and other provisions, reserves, and allowances.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from provisions, reserves, allowances, and accruals, classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesTaxDeferredIncome.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Tax Deferred Income
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesTaxDeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from tax deferred revenue or income classified as other.

Deposits.label: Deposits
Deposits.description: The aggregate of all deposit liabilities held by the entity, including foreign and domestic, interest and noninterest bearing; may include demand deposits, saving deposits, Negotiable Order of Withdrawal (NOW) and time deposits among others.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposa.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) from Disposal of Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossFromDisposa.description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLo.label: Discontinued Operation, Tax Effect of Gain (Loss) from Disposal of Discontinued Operation
DiscontinuedOperationTaxEffectOfIncomeLo.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Revenue
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of revenue attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationFore.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations applicable to statutory income tax expense (benefit) outside of the country of domicile.

ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.label: Excess Stock, Shares Authorized
ExcessStockSharesAuthorized.description: Maximum number of excess stock shares permitted to be issued.

ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.label: Excess Stock, Shares Outstanding
ExcessStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of excess stock held by shareholders.

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax.label: Income (Loss) from Subsidiaries, before Tax
IncomeLossFromSubsidiariesBeforeTax.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) of subsidiary attributable to the parent entity.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Security Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInSecurityDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in security deposits.

InventoryFinishedGoods.label: Inventory, Finished Goods, Gross
InventoryFinishedGoods.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of completed merchandise or goods expected to be sold within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InventoryRawMaterialsAndPurchasedPartsNe.label: Inventory, Raw Materials and Purchased Parts, Net of Reserves
InventoryRawMaterialsAndPurchasedPartsNe.description: Carrying amount, net of valuation reserves and adjustments, as of the balance sheet date of items purchased for use as components of a finished product or pieces of machinery and equipment plus any items in their natural and unrefined state. This element may be used when the reporting entity combines raw materials and purchased parts into an aggregate amount.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LongTermInvestments.label: Long-term Investments
LongTermInvestments.description: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

NetAssetValuePerShare.label: Net Asset Value Per Share
NetAssetValuePerShare.description: Net asset value per share or per unit of investments in certain entities that calculate net asset value per share. Includes, but is not limited to, by unit, membership interest, or other ownership interest. Investment includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain hedge funds, venture capital funds, private equity funds, real estate partnerships or funds. Excludes fair value disclosure.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Business Combination
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

RegulatedOperatingRevenue.label: Regulated Operating Revenue
RegulatedOperatingRevenue.description: The total amount of regulated operating revenues recognized during the period.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ResultsOfOperationsRevenueOther.label: Results of Operations, Revenue, Other
ResultsOfOperationsRevenueOther.description: Other revenues from oil and gas producing activities.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Short-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, over Time
ShortTermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of short-term debt outstanding calculated over time.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueTreasuryStoc.description: Value of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Accounts Payable and Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

DepreciationAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Nonproduction
DepreciationAndAmortization.description: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfLongtermInvestments.label: Proceeds from Sale of Long-term Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfLongtermInvestments.description: The cash inflow from sales of all investments, including securities and other assets, having ready marketability and intended by management to be liquidated, if necessary, beyond the current operating cycle.

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AdjustmentForAmortization.label: Amortization
AdjustmentForAmortization.description: The aggregate amount of recurring noncash expense charged against earnings in the period to allocate the cost of assets over their estimated remaining economic lives.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AmountOfRestrictedNetAssetsForConsolidat.label: Amount of Restricted Net Assets for Consolidated and Unconsolidated Subsidiaries
AmountOfRestrictedNetAssetsForConsolidat.description: Amount of restricted net assets of consolidated and unconsolidated subsidiaries as of the end of the most recently completed fiscal year.

ContractualObligation.label: Contractual Obligation
ContractualObligation.description: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

ContractualObligationDueInFourthYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
ContractualObligationDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInNextTwelveMont.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
ContractualObligationDueInNextTwelveMont.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInSecondYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
ContractualObligationDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInThirdYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
ContractualObligationDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GrantsReceivable.label: Grants Receivable
GrantsReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts due under the terms of governmental, corporate, or foundation grants.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Trade
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.description: Change in recurring obligations of a business that arise from the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services used in the production and sale of goods and services.

InventoryRawMaterials.label: Inventory, Raw Materials, Gross
InventoryRawMaterials.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of raw materials expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PaymentsToSuppliers.label: Payments to Suppliers
PaymentsToSuppliers.description: Payments of cash to suppliers for goods and services during the current period.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Interest in Consolidated Subsidiaries
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfInterestInConso.description: The cash inflow associated with the deconsolidation of a previously consolidated subsidiary or the sale of investment in consolidated subsidiaries (generally greater than 50 percent).

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

RentalIncomeNonoperating.label: Rental Income, Nonoperating
RentalIncomeNonoperating.description: Income earned by providing the use of assets to an outside party in exchange for a payment or series of payments that is nonoperating in nature.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.label: Supplemental Deferred Purchase Price
SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.description: A device of credit enhancement where a part of the purchase price for the receivable/ payable is retained to serve as a cash collateral.

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedPartiesCur.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Related Parties, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToRelatedPartiesCur.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations to be paid to the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries; subsidiaries of a common parent; an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management; an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Number of Securities Called by Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightNumberOfSecuritiesC.description: Number of securities into which the class of warrant or right may be converted. For example, but not limited to, 500,000 warrants may be converted into 1,000,000 shares.

DeferredTaxAssetsInventory.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Inventory
DeferredTaxAssetsInventory.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from inventory.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Assets
DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.label: Fair Value, Option, Changes in Fair Value, Gain (Loss)
FairValueOptionChangesInFairValueGainLos.description: For each line item in the statement of financial position, the amounts of gains and losses from fair value changes included in earnings.

HedgingAssetsCurrent.label: Hedging Assets, Current
HedgingAssetsCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from a financial instrument or a contract used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RestrictedStockAwardForfeitures.label: Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
RestrictedStockAwardForfeitures.description: The total value of forfeitures related to restricted stock awards forfeited during the period.

TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHed.label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Net of Tax
TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHed.description: Amount, after tax, of cumulative translation adjustment attributable to gain (loss) on foreign currency derivatives that are designated as, and are effective as, economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity.

BankLoans.label: Broker-Dealer, Bank Loan, Short-term
BankLoans.description: Amount of short-term bank loan secured by broker-dealer customer's security.
